headline: American Tower Weighs DISH Default Against Data Center Growth And Valuation
summary: DISH Network has defaulted on lease payments to American Tower, leading the tower operator to pursue legal action to recover unpaid obligations. The company has updated its 2026 outlook to reflect the impact of lost DISH lease revenue on its US tower business. Management is leaning on tighter operations, a focus on developed markets, and expansion of its data center platform to offset these headwinds. For investors watching NYSE:AMT at a share price of $190.19, the DISH default is a...

headline: Is American Tower (AMT) Pricing Look Attractive After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: If you are wondering whether American Tower is priced fairly or offering value right now, you are not alone. This article is designed to help you unpack that question using clear numbers. The stock last closed at US$190.19, with returns of 6.4% over the past 30 days and 8.8% year to date, but a 3.4% decline over the past year and a 1.5% decline over the last week. These movements can influence how investors view both its growth potential and risk. Recent headlines around American Tower have...
